name: Passthrough Windows
description:
Convert your walls into a mixed reality landscape. Choose between various scenes by diving into an underwater seascape or relaxing under a starry night sky. Select a fully immersive experience of sights and sounds by opening each wall. Check out the full demo video to see Passthrough Windows in action.

If have any issues with installing or running Passthrough Windows on your headset please send an email to passthroughstudio@gmail.com and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

*Important: this app is optimized for the Oculus Quest 2. It has not been tested on the Oculus Quest 1.
